official_title: A bill to designate "America the Beautiful" as the national hymn of the United States of America.

summary.text: Designates the composition known as "America the Beautiful" as the national hymn of the United States. Declares that this designation shall not be construed to repeal or affect the Act designating the Star-Spangled Banner as the national anthem.

titles.title: A bill to designate "America the Beautiful" as the national hymn of the United States of America.
